attributes.action: Make it illegal for a private/residential security camera/cctv system to be pointed at a neighbour's property or a public street.
attributes.additional_details:
It is currently legal for people to erect "security" cameras and cctv on their own property and make recordings, provided it is for personal use.  These can be pointed at your property, your windows and the street.  I consider this a gross infringement of ALL our Human Rights.

I would like the Government to change the law and protect the little rights we have left.
